imdb.plot outline: A 60-minute daily broadcast of ProBg TV on contemporary culture. The series reveals and analyzes a number of artistic events and addresses issues related to the creative process. Each episode meets a leading figure in the world of art and inquires into the impact of cultural trends on the lives of modern people. An essential aspect of the series comes from the reports behind the stage of leading theatre productions, opera, and dance performances, concerts, installations and fine art exhibitions. Every day the show places its focus on the diversity of street arts and the different, yet less known to the audience artistic professions such as set designers, wig masters, costume creators, special effects make-up artist and much more. A truly authentic, visually rich and poetic attempt to discover an unusual angle of cultural reality, a unique point of view and deepened analyses.
imdb.title: Art Traffic
plot: An authentic, visually rich and poetic attempt to discover and analyze a different angle of cultural reality.

A 60-minute daily broadcast of ProBg TV on contemporary culture. The series reveals and analyzes a number of artistic events and addresses issues related to the creative process. Each episode meets a leading figure in the world of art and inquires into the impact of cultural trends on the lives of modern people. An essential aspect of the series comes from the reports behind the stage of leading theatre productions, opera, and dance performances, concerts, installations and fine art exhibitions. Every day the show places its focus on the diversity of street arts and the different, yet less known to the audience artistic professions such as set designers, wig masters, costume creators, special effects make-up artist and much more. A truly authentic, visually rich and poetic attempt to discover an unusual angle of cultural reality, a unique point of view and deepened analyses.
